dmca.title: [ABUSE] Copyright Infringment on your server
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf Of
The Planet Policy Enforcement
Sent: Monday, February 27, 2006 5:47 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Copyright Infringment on your server]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] Copyright Infringment on your server
Date: Mon, 27 Feb 2006 21:32:52 +1000
From: Interlotto.com <win@interlotto.com>
To: abuse@theplanet.com <abuse@theplanet.com>
CC: legal-response@theplanet.com <legal-response@theplanet.com>

To whom it may concern.

IMMEDIATE ACTION REQUIRED - COPYRIGHT INFRINGMENT

My name is Darrell Tuck, I am the owner of the domain INTERLOTTO.COM

I have today been alerted to a SPAM campaign & COPYRIGHT INFRINGMENT which
is fraudulently using my content and website in its postings.  The Site
infringing copyright is UKNATIONALEMAILLOTTERY.COM  - they have copied my
content in its entirety and appear to be using it for the purposes of
Nigerian type scams.

Its owner is listed as TONY CINO

The site appears to have been registered thru MELBOURNE IT LTD and is
currently listed as being hosted at THEPLANET.COM

I request as the registered owner of the website, and the legal copyright
holder of the content that you take immediate action to remove the copyright
material and restrict it from being made available to the public via your
website.

You can contact me on DARRELL TUCK at win@interlotto.com

Regards

Darrell Tuck




- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.4.2 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Mozilla - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFEA4+RvK/XpJs6oyURAicYAJ9gaj+s++OkYzo/qrzxInV4dmKnagCggcvt
0Xn6wr2d34h9ifDnPzuLq1E=
=ItJq
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
